scripts.package: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && cp -r app/* dist/ && cp -R node_modules dist/ && cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip *
scripts.run-local-initial: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -e data/initial_request.js
scripts.run-local-followup: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -e data/followup_request.js
